title: Saddle Bag, 1900–1948
medium:
Medium: vicuña wool
Technique: tapestry weave
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: White bag with a design of vertical stripes in black and brown with multicolored geometrical motifs. Twisted cord of white and tan all around the bag.
